name: China Vanke Co., Ltd.
summary: China Vanke Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development and sale of properties in the Mainland China, Hong Kong, and internationally. The company operates through Property Development and Property Management segments. It develops residential buildings, commercial offices, and other ancillary facilities. The company also provides property management and related services to purchasers and tenants of its own developed residential properties, shopping arcades, and office buildings, as well as to properties developed by external property developers; and undertakes construction contracts. In addition, it is involved in logistics and warehousing, hotel and resort, education, and housing rental businesses. The company was incorporated in 1984 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

name: two
summary: two is a blank check company. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Shenzhen Fountain Corporation
summary: Shenzhen Fountain Corporation engages in real estate development, clean energy, transportation, and waste management activities in China. The company operates various fleets of electric vehicles (EVs) at residential and tourism developments under the HANSOME EValet brand, as well as light truck EVs for intra city logistics; and provides power-charging infrastructure at various transportation hubs and residential communities. It also develops low carbon neighborhood; and operates city chilling stations to provide cooling services to the communities, and infrastructure for cold chain food and beverage storage and logistics, as well as cold chain retail spaces and EV cold chain distributors. Shenzhen Fountain Corporation was founded in 1990 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

name: Shenzhen Zhenye (Group) Co.,Ltd.
summary: Shenzhen Zhenye (Group) Co.,Ltd. engages in the development, management, and rental of real estate properties in China. The company provides residence, commercial properties, villas, etc. It is also involved in the shantytowns transformation and distinctive town construction activities. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

name: Shenzhen Quanxinhao Co., Ltd.
summary: Shenzhen Quanxinhao Co., Ltd. owns and operates hotels in China. The company operates the Grand hotel located in Shenzhen and the Asia Gulf hotel located in Xiamen. It also provides property management, financial information consulting, venture capital, financial investment, equity investment, and investment management services. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
